name: The Hero's Way
description:
Welcome to The Hero's Way! The hero is armed with sword, shield and bow, and is ready to fight the rebellious dead who attack him from all sides. But he's not afraid - his courage and skill with weapons will help him overcome any challenge.

He forges ahead through the waves of the risen dead, feeling their sinister breath on his face. He attacks with his sword, defends himself with his shield, and shoots his bow to defeat his enemies. His rolls help him dodge dangerous attacks and move quickly across the battlefield.

But that's just the beginning - each risen dead has its own unique characteristics, which require the hero's utmost attention and skill. With each killed enemy the hero collects bonuses and improvements that help him become even stronger and more effective in battle.

Get ready for battle, hero! Your bravery and strength will be a bulwark in this world of the risen dead, and you will defeat them all!
